channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
I feel stupid for asking this, but I've never had this problem before. I can't compile, it keeps saying that he cannot find it.
here's my compiler: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" *.java @echo Compiler Done! pause
I've tried multiple compilers on this forum, all keep saying the same. Also, I'm sure I have JDK version 1.6.0_24

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

“C:\Program Files\Java\YOUR_JAVA_VERSION\bin\javac.exe”

My computer > program files > Java > Java Version > Bin.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

It just keeps saying he cannot find the path.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“metal k0, post:1, topic:393966”]I feel stupid for asking this, but I’ve never had this problem before. I can’t compile, it keeps saying that he cannot find it.

here’s my compiler:
@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe” *.java
@echo Compiler Done!
pause

I’ve tried multiple compilers on this forum, all keep saying the same. Also, I’m sure I have JDK version 1.6.0_24[/quote]

Post the exact error.

Read full topic
